settings.title: We’ve Got You Covered
settings.text:
When you purchase a FORM EV, you’re not just getting the best-made electric golf cart available today. You’re also getting full backing and support from our team of experienced professionals paired with an industry-leading 2 year or 1,500-mile warranty (whichever comes first)

When it comes to upkeep, maintenance, and repair, we are your go-to resource for supplies of original parts for all our models. Give us a call today or email us and we will match you quickly with quality replacement parts and service advice.

settings.title: Schedule Service
settings.text: Please call 320-300-5544 to schedule a service appointment.
